entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023
